filter.name: general2
filter.description: Case in-sensitive search across multiple fields and descriptions
filter.label: General (testing)
filter.aql: name matches anywhere ignore-case '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse.place.of.interest:cataloging/name) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:description/description) matches anywhere ignore-case '$${Value}$$' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@object-irn) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*' or xpath(emu:record/irn) matches ignore-case'$${Value}$$*' or xpath(powerhouse:related-objects/object/@registration-number) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*' or xpath(powerhouse.object.of.interest:cataloging/registration-number) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*' or xpath(powerhouse.digital.asset:production/job-ids/id) matches ignore-case '$${Value}$$*'
